General.Name: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited provides life reinsurance services to various life insurance companies in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. The company offers research and analytics, marketing planning, product design and development, new distribution channel development, medical underwriting consulting, and claims management services. Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand..
